name: Vikri Usman Rizky
title: DevOps Engineer
summary_title: Cloud Infrastructure, CI/CD Automation, and System Reliability.
summary: DevOps Engineer with over 5 years of experience delivering full-cycle software development for 17+ projects in the telecommunications, finance, and public sectors. Proficient in CI/CD, microservices architecture, cloud-native development, and cross-functional collaboration. Specialized in automating deployments, optimizing databases, and ensuring high availability in production environments.
